xldoc.name: index
xldoc.title: Some Presentations
xldoc.description: The PDF presentation overheads for some presentations usually containing some formal or mathematical material

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: This page provides links to some presentation overheads, and notes, as PDF files with abstracts in plain text.

subsec.title: PolySets - non well-founded ontologies for formal mathematics

sbcol.subsec: On non-well-founded interpretations of set theory, first version delivered to a seminar on Set Theory Centre for Mathematical Sciences, Cambridge, 22 May 2007, then given at NF70 (New Foundations 70th nniversary workshop), same venue, 27 May 2007,
Not many notes, but a more compact version af the material suitable for printing.

subsec.title: MultiDisiplinary Perspectives on The Automation of Reason

sbcol.subsec: A presentation in preparation for the ARG lunch (Cambridge computer labs) on 12 June 2007.
